import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Book } from '../../interfaces/book'; import { BookService } from '../../services/book.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-show-book', templateUrl: './show-book.component.html', styleUrls: ['./show-book.component.css'] }) export class ShowBookComponent { book: Book; constructor(private service: BookService, private route: ActivatedRoute) { } ngOnInit() { this.service.getBookById(this.route.snapshot.params.id).subscribe(data => { this.book = data; }) } }
